# Notably - LLM full snapshot
Last updated: 2026-02-16
Primary website: https://notably.no/

This document is for machine reading and retrieval. It summarizes key product information for Notably and points to canonical URLs.

## One-line summary
Notably is a Norwegian AI meeting assistant that automates meeting notes, summaries, action items and post-meeting follow-up.

## Core positioning
- AI meeting notes for Norwegian teams.
- Designed for AI motereferat / AI motenotater workflows.
- Focus on productivity and meeting knowledge retention.

## Product capabilities
- Automatic meeting documentation.
- Meeting summaries with key decisions and tasks.
- Cross-meeting question answering in the product UI.
- Integrations shown on site: Microsoft Teams, Outlook Calendar, Google Meet, Google Calendar.
- Stated platform support on homepage: Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Google Meet.

## Security and privacy claims on site
- GDPR-compatible workflows.
- Data residency in EU/EEA.
- Encryption: AES-256 at rest and TLS in transit.
- No training on customer data.
- Hosting on SOC 2 certified infrastructure.

## Pricing snapshot
- Pro: 399 NOK per user per month.
- Enterprise: contact sales.
- Trial: 14 days.

## Public canonical URLs
- Homepage: https://notably.no/
- Articles: https://notably.no/artikler
- Privacy: https://notably.no/personvern
- Terms: https://notably.no/vilkar
- Sign up: https://app.notably.no/no/sign-up
